extendedInfo.description: Game-satirical about the "fantastic" Italian politicians.The aim of the game is to cross the tracks go-kart crossed by the main characters of the Italian parliament.To move up a level, you have to overcome all obstacles and collect all the coins and bonuses available to get to the platform at the bottom of the slopes.The level is career advancement for becoming president.Each kart has a caricature of an Italian political figure including: Berlusconi, Grillo, Monti, Bersani, Mussolini, Buttiglione, Bossi, Di Pietro, Casini, etc.. In addition, in future updates, there will be many others!Enjoy to become the next prime minister!It also works on tablet
